description: This table contains claim (CLM) IDs associated with a document (DCS). For example, if a document is a Periodic Explanation of Benefits, the claims in the Periodic Explanation of Benefits will be stored in this table.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DOC_REL_CLM_ID
columns.description: Stores the Claim IDs related to the document
